text: To Serve Them All My Days is a British drama television series based on the 1972 novel by R. F. Delderfield. It ran for 13 episodes on BBC One in 1980 and 1981. It stars John Duttine, Frank Middlemass, Alan MacNaughtan, Patricia Lawerence, Susan Jameson, Nicholas Lyndhurst. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 television series debuts Category:1981 television series endings Category:BBC Television programmes
title: To Serve Them All My Days (TV series)
